summary: This mod removes the buggy endless loop of loud incessant wind noises in all areas at all times, unless you are in menus.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Looped Wind Sound Bug Fix[/b]

[heading]Bug Description[/heading]
For some users, this glitch appears during/after the Alduin fight, for others (like me) it occurs if you have the Deadly Dragons Mod installed and encounter a storm dragon. You get to hear the same wind/rain/thunder sound in an endless loop in all areas at all times unless you are in menus.

[heading]Mod Description[/heading]
This mod aims to fix this buggy behavior by replacing the sound file \"amb_weather_alduinstormcall_lp.wav\" with about a second\'s worth of silence.

[heading]FAQ / Further information[/heading]
If this mod does not help you fix your looped sound, there are a couple of other possible reasons.

[list]
[*] check out the Elemental Fury - Sound BUG - Solution mod by 1GurU9 here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/456/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/456/[/url]
[*] try the Chillrend Sound Bug Fix and Removal Mod by Voular here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/896/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/896/[/url]
[*] for some users it may help to enter \"sexchange\" in the console twice (once may fix the bug, the second time will revert the gender change effect)
[/list] 

[heading]Installation[/heading]
Install using the Nexus Mod Manager or manually copy the files to your Data folder of your Skyrim installation.

[heading]Uninstallation[/heading]
Uninstall using the Nexus Mod Manager or manually delete the files from you Data folder of your Skyrim installation.

[heading]Conclusion[/heading]
Let me know if this helps you fix your saves and please discuss/comment with other solutions you have found!
author: boonz
